name: Iaro Nkwberq
message: My husband and I have N0W. We got a Smoke's Survey in the mail and on that survey it asked us if we were saving the Doral seals. We now save the Doral seals but we wanted to know if their use can be explained. We received a calendar with coupons which he gave to us because he didn't want it. But we would really appreciate a catalog or anything for Doral. If you have a mailing list, we would appreciate it if you would put us on it. We would mail us a catalog on what to buy with the Doral seals. We really enjoy the taste and freshness of your Doral menthol cigarettes. Thank you very much.
